Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Allows for SNAP benefits to be used to purchase menstrual products
Summary: Allows for SNAP benefits to be used to purchase menstrual products including, but not limited to, sanitary napkins, tampons and panty liners.
LawCode: Amd ยง95, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to allowing for SNAP benefits to be used to purchase menstrual products
